summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3268 for the improvement of 20th Avenue West, from a connection with the West Wheeler Street Bridge at 20th Avenue West and Thorndyke Avenue to Gilman Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43063, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund. .
